descriptionHtml:
*UPDATE 5/20/2013*

-Jesus, nearly forgot about this mod. No longer a replacer, adds a standalone shield, the "Spartan Hoplon Shield" (without arrows) that is craftable at the forge and made a leveled item with the bandits tribes, and also adds an enchanted version "Leonidas' Hoplon" (with arrows) which can be found with the Jagged Crown in Korvanjund.

Special thanks to TYRANNICON for featuring my shield in his machinima "Skyrim: 300 (Battle of Thermopylae)" which can be viewed under the video tab or here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4ct1668FUKs



A friend asked me to make the Spartan shield from the movie 300, so i quickly did this.

As always constructive critiques are appreciated.



Done using Maya 2012

Textured in photoshop

Please ASK AND WAIT for permission from me BEFORE posting any of my models on your own mods, edited or otherwise!!!

IN LIGHT OF RECENT EVENTS WITH VALVES VENTURE INTO MONETIZE MODS ON STEAM WORKSHOP, ANY MOD OR MOD AUTHOR WHOM I GAVE PERMISSION TO USE MY ASSETS FOR THEIR MOD ARE NOT PERMITTED TO MONETIZE IT! DMCA CLAIMS WILL BE SUBMITTED AGAINST MODS WHO DO NOT RESPECT MY WISH TO KEEP MY CONTENT FREE.
author: Davis237
